Additional GEO Studies

Study Title GEO Link Data Notes Tasks
Gene expression in colon cancer stem cells (CSC) cultures identified by Wnt signaling levels GSE33112 (obtain via GEOQuery)  
Targets of Wnt-1 in C57MG GSE1899 GSE1899.matrix.txt Data file columns:
GENE_SYMBOL Mouse gene symbol corresponding to this microarray probe
ID_REF Microarray probe identifier
GSM* signal intensity columns for each sample
consists intensity measureof single comparison between control and treated
  • Using Bash or R code, compute the number of different probes and the unique number of genes represented in this data
  • Using R code, calculate a ratio of treated/control and express this as logarithm base 2
  • Sort the data according to the calculated ratio, and identify those genes which have at least one probe with log2 ratio > 1 or log 2 ratio < -1
  • Use the DAVID tools to analyse the set of genes with log2 ratio > 1 or log2 ratio < -1
Gene expression in colon cancer stem cells (CSC) cultures identified by Wnt signaling levels GSE33112 (obtain via GEOQuery)  
  • Using the GEO interface, identify genes that are differentially expressed in low Colo200 vs high Colo200
  • Download the top 250 genes, and analyse using DAVID
